# PTD Today Daily Intelligence Brief

---

### 2) Top Stories  
- Orsted contests the US governmentâ€™s halt of its $5 billion offshore wind project. (Source: Reuters)  
- The deadly Swiss ski resort bar fire, likely caused by champagne sparklers, resulted in about 40 fatalities. (Source: CNN, Reuters)  
- Witnesses to the Swiss fire describe hazardous conditions involving a narrow staircase and the use of sparklers. (Source: CNN)  
- Britain's FTSE-100 index reached a historic 10,000 mark for the first time. (Source: Reuters)  
- New York City Mayor Mamdani revokes previous Israel-related executive orders to focus on housing. (Source: CNN)  
- Multiple survivor accounts and eyewitness reports emerge from the Swiss fire tragedy. (Source: Reuters, WSJ)
